storyInfo: In a dastardly knight melee, an Infected knight suffers an accident in the field, making waves—and this news, manipulated to boot, is gradually concealed by the sound of advertisements.

attributes.content: Hyaaargh!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Damn you, Infected—with the nerve to—
attributes.name: A Competing Knight

attributes.content: Go on, leave. You don't deserve to be here.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Peh! I'll drag you out of the scoring pen at the least!
attributes.name: A Competing Knight

attributes.content: —! Ugh!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: That's fine, I've still got my points—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Is that right? Oripathic filth?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Ungh?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Tch, Ingra...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That's it! Brassrust! Keep it up! Get him out of the scoring pen!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Break his hand! Keep going! Don't let that Infected get away!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Shh! Keep it down! Look at the seats over there...
attributes.name: A Sensible Spectator

attributes.content: Huh? Why's she all alone there...? 'Infected Knight seating?'
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Not too loud. She was looking this way earlier.
attributes.name: A Sensible Spectator

attributes.content: Hah, aren't there divider walls between the seats? She can't hear anything, right? Besides, you think an Infected would have the guts to climb over here to get at me?
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: This is a knight's swordsmanship, Ingra. All that blunt movement of yours really is unwatchable.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: *Spit*... Infected refuse... daring to lecture me? Wait until I've flayed you and pulled your bones apart... then you'll regret it.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (He really is no brains, all brawn. I just need to wait while he loses his cool.)
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: (Oh, here it comes!)
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Goddamned Infected trash—
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: —Trash? Why do I feel like it's you knights, resting on your laurels, who can't stand the heat?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Grgh! He can push me off?!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: No, your tiny little playsword could never... is it Arts technique? Wind Arts? Or just pure driving strength?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Would I ever tell you? Olmer Ingra.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You—take this!!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (Wait, what—?!)
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Tch, it really was wind.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: It seems it's only good enough to bolster your movements. Far short of what deranged things the Wind Knight can pull.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (Analysis? So he isn't just a simple-minded moron...)
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hmph, Infected. That sword of yours has no Arts unit, yet still cast... disgusting. The Arts given to you by the Originium in your organs will not change the outcome of this.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: That rotten Blood Knight is the same. Just because some Infected knights have cobbled together a false renown, he forces the common folk to recognize the Infected?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: The Adeptus Sprawiedliwi have been just too kind to you all. Know how grateful you should be, Oripathic filth.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Grateful?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: To you lot?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hah, such attitude? The Infected crawling and struggling along Kazimierz's lowest layers, you genuinely dare to cast contempt on the knight nobles?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Do you know the price the Infected pay for our legal emancipation?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hah, why should I know? I only know your coming death will be wretched—
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Do you know how brutal a female gloompincer is when it's been snatched from its egg? Do you know, when Infected knights are selected... the tacit homicide that happens?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Oh, 'your coming death will be wretched.' Big words, Olmer Ingra. You just relish in bullying the weak. It's a miracle you have the guts to step into a deathmatch.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: —Have you seen what happens to all the lives deemed cheap? You knight noble filth?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: There's only five still standing their ground in the scoring pen?!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Kurde! I spent all my savings on this bet, and that idiot doesn't even touch the pen for half an hour?
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Why's there still an Infected? Are they fighting 'Brassrust' Ingra?!
attributes.name: A Rowdy Spectator

attributes.content: Hey! Get rid of that filthy asshole! Ingra!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Ingra! Ingra! Ingra!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Wh-What was that? An earthquake?
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: No, no, it's that Infected knight over there... she stomped the ground something fierce just now...
attributes.name: A Rowdy Spectator

attributes.content: ...Tch.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: These dumbasses... starting to gang up on the Infected, huh.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: How's that?! Are you hurting now, Ingra?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Wha... am I being surrounded?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: ...Infected...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: You have no right to be here.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Ugh—?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Forfeit, Infected.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: I don't like how Ingra does things, but neither my Knightclub nor my family would stand for the humiliation of an Infected sharing the podium.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: You... love a good excuse, don't you...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Don't get me wrong. Only one can stand in the scoring pen in the end.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: This is a brawl, Infected, but right now, you've made yourself the prime target.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: ...Feh.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Heedless wretches... once I dispose of this Infected, you're all next.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Sir Ingra... I'm wounded and would be hard-pressed to vie for the title, but at least for the moment, we should work together to topple that Infected slave.
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: These depraved Infected with the gall to talk their tripe at knights. You all know of the disturbance the Infected caused before, don't you?
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub always was a suspicious lot. Rumor has it they orchestrate the illegal Infected congregations.
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: Exploiting the riches from winning alongside us to harm the safety of Kawalerielki, and even Kazimierz in whole? Should we be indulging such action?
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: ...Illegal Infected?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: All I saw was a tragedy of people without a home! A tragedy of people dumped out of the factories, the farms and the beast ranches!!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Less of the row, Infected.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: If that's how you truly see it, you ought to go on your merry way back to the Infected shelters. No need to stay here, overwhelmed as you are.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Let's be brutally honest. You ache to put every knight to death, don't you? You're welling with rage, gasping for vengeance, aren't you?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Then what are you waiting for?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: —You!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Ghakh—hah, hah—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Cur! I'll cleave your hand off and slap you awake with it!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: (No, I can't stay any longer in this fight, I need to—)
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Not today.
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: You lot... Get out of my—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Ungh?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Dammit... What are you people doing?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Naught but standing here.
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: You have nowhere to run this time!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Gargh...!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Oh-ho, your armor's up to snuff. That blow should've cleaved your spine in twain.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Gakgh... gakgh... *cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I don't understand why the Knights Association would allow your lot into the Major. Isn't your blood a deadly toxin?
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: Enough.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Infected, get out of here. Just give up.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: You've already been gravely wounded. Any more, and you'll never win another match.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: —Shut up!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You... you people... sanctimonious thugs...!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Ugh?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Sanctimonious. Is that what you think of me?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: We'll see how long you can keep up the sniveling little traitor act. You'll be kneeling, begging for forgiveness...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Hey, where are the judges? What the hell is this?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Are these knights gonna just rig up their own shitshow right here?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ingra! Ingra! Ingra!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Long live Brassrust! Long live Kazimierz! Long live the knights!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Get that Infected up! Make him get up!
attributes.name: A Rowdy Spectator

attributes.content: Get him on his feet! Keep him fighting!! Let's see how tough he really is!!
attributes.name: A Rowdy Spectator

attributes.content: ...*Hiss*!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What? What the? St... Stay away from me, alright??
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: What say I toss you down there? Get you closer to the action? Huh?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Wait.. you...
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: What are you doing?! You're a KNIGHT and you're gonna assault the audience?
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: ...What...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Where's security?! Security! There's an Infected assaulting civilians!!
attributes.name: A Rowdy Spectator

attributes.content: You sonnovabitch!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Gagh...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Y... You...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Still have strength in you?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Guh—ulgh... blugh...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: That's close enough, Brassrust, he's liable to die.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: He might be Infected, but still a registered knight. We don't need the National Council pestering us over an Infected.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Tch! What are you gesturing at me for?! Huh? Who do you think you are?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: One of us has to lose, Brassrust. There's only one victor in this match.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Exactly what I—
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: What is this? Wind? You still intend to resist?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Hah. You know, an electric fan destined for junk blows more of a breeze than you do, Infected. What's the matter?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: ...You'll... regret this...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hoh...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Has he a death wish?!
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: The wind's—picked up? He's still got strength?
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Ngh—
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: You!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: All of you...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hey, hey, look at the Infected!
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: What's he doing?! Is he casting Arts?
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: —Arts? No! He can't keep this up—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Ingra... and the rest of you!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: None of you have the first idea what the Infected have to go through... Did we get Oripathy because we wanted it?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Families abandon us. Fellow soldiers abandon us. You people throw us into the beast arenas like trash, to bleed alongside starving gloompincers.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I'll have you—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I'll die here.
Right. This is an arena. A Major arena. But in the end, it was only ever built to hold greater and greater show tournaments.
No.
No matter where it is... what does it matter when an Infected 'has an accident?'
Don't resist, and I really will be beaten, wide awake, to death.
That's right.
I need to resist.
There's nothing left but to resist.
I'll make you... pay in blood...!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Ugh, the wind's getting stronger...
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Hmph. If I hang around here, come soon enough, I won't be beating any of you. My Knightclub superiors will understand.
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: I was thinking I'd win by playing the bystander. If there's no chance, I'm out, I'm out! You deal with this yourselves!
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: Infected can cast without an Arts Unit. That's unfair.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: I'll be reporting to Northwood Knight Order, Infected have to be constrained... We should withdraw for now, Brassrust.
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Brassrust?
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Not a sound... He wants to kill me, waste his very life on these Arts so he can humiliate me...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: No! You can't run!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hah! Why would I ever run?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: I'll tear your miserable Arts and that face of yours into pieces, and dance with your blood under my boots—!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Come! Unmentionable Infected!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: I'll... do you in.. I'll...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Oh.
When we divorced, was she the one who got the photo album?
Shame. I won't get to see my precious—
Wha—What happened, right at the end there? Did the wind stop?
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: Then Brassrust's hatchet... it...
attributes.name: An Excited Spectator

attributes.content: No! Shit!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... Such a floundering outburst, and where did it get you?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: What's the matter, Infected?! Spent at the last moment?!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: You mockeries of—
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Hold on... is he...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Dead?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: The Infected... died?
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: But––
attributes.name: An Ingratiating Knight

attributes.content: Get the medics here! Now! This is an arena! An infection on this scale—
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Brassrust! Get away from him!
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: He died...?
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Hahah, hahahah... he tried casting that piffling burst of Arts, and died?!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: This is why you Infected all—
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Please vacate the arena, Brassrust Knight, sir.
attributes.name: A Security Officer

attributes.content: The medics are stepping in. When we're sure there's no risk of contagion, we'll transport him in a sealed container.
attributes.name: A Security Officer

attributes.content: ...Tch.
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris—! Do you want every knight here your enemy?! Well?!
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: —Put him down!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: We're taking these precautions for the safety of the rest of the knights as well as the audience. Please comply.
attributes.name: A Security Officer

attributes.content: Brassrust, sir, please make your way out.
attributes.name: A Security Officer

attributes.content: Hmph, filthy knight... I certainly don't want my life ruined by Oripathy...
attributes.name: Brassrust Knight

attributes.content: Are you Infected too? Please calm down, this is a Major...
attributes.name: A Security Officer

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Can't you see he's still got life in him?! Move!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Now!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Steady. Are you looking to provoke the Knights Association?
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: Leave this to the medical personnel—
attributes.name: A Staid Knight

attributes.content: *cough*! *cough* *cough* *cough*—!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: *gasp*...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Let me over!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Leave her be... she's Infected too. Get the audience evacuated first.
attributes.name: A Security Officer

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Heh... not exactly...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Blood loss... least of my problems...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Aches in my infected spots... they're spreading... hurts...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Dear visitors: there has been an incident in the arena. We ask that you follow staff instructions for a prompt evacuation. The award ceremony will be postponed by two hours.
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: We repeat—dear visitors...
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: Wild Mane.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: ...Please... you have to...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Sona'll find your wife and girl.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Don't worry.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Look! The Originium is spreading across him! We can't wait any longer, put him in the container now!
attributes.name: A Security Officer

attributes.content: What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Preventing infection.
attributes.name: A Security Officer

attributes.content: ...You... damned...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Iwona!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Remember their faces!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Remember... These knights... These Kazimierzians... These cold-blooded murderers...
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Don't let them get away with it!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: It's your turn. Deal already.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: What's your rush? Just let me think.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What've you got to think about with this few cards left?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: We now report on an urgent news story—
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: An accident occurred at a capture the flag event held today as part of the Major Show Tournament—
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: —an Infected knight concealed his condition before the competition and sustained heavy injuries during the match, all while forcing Originium Arts—
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: —went into shock partway through the event, and passed away after aid proved ineffective—
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: ...Infected...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Passed away? Died? Died on the field?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: According to reports, medical personnel on the scene have finished cleanup of the field, and the arena will return to normal use tomorrow following decontamination.
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: With only three hours since the incident, the National Council have already received mass complaints, and look to revise the Infected Knights Act—
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: Revise the act? Pull the other one, they're just petrified of owning up!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: When the Blood Knight came about, they were pressured to recognize Infected as legitimate. If they fiddle with the laws now, how are they going to save their reputation?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: The question of the Infected's no child's game... you think 'reputation' could affect their policymaking?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Was the knight nobles' 'reputation' ever any worse? Decades ago?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Times are different. I can't say I know what they're thinking now, but no matter whereabouts, enforcing the rules takes priority over any objective results.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: We've all suffered for it.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Cleanup has been completed. All knights who took part will be given a medical examination within the next three days—
attributes.name: A Voice on the Television

attributes.content: With regard to this incident, the Knights Association is paying a correspondingly high amount of attention.
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: Currently, several Knightclubs have cosigned a statement to the Association on the accidental deaths of Infected, uncontrollable Originium Arts, as well as the risk of large-scale infection breaking out during the Major...
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: Haah—!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: No problems, Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Your adjustments to the weapon core are perfect. It's been a long while now since I've wielded something so effortlessly smooth.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Ah... mm-hm!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I made them especially based on your past fights after all, heheh.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: If we're done with all the theory, we'll want a little practical combat to try things out.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria, keep to one side.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ah... okay!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You take it easy now, both of you!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: My, that's a good look in your eyes, Margaret.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: This is for real now. If you throw, my self-respect will be very sore for it.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Now, then—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: —Accordingly, we have invited numerous experts on knight competition to publish their own views. We now go to the Knights Association Officer-in-Charge.
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: Ah. Good morning, people of Kazimierz—
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: —Infected can cast without an Arts Unit; this is known to medical science—
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: But in the arena, such an ability is 'exceedingly unfair'—
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: (Fairness.)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Fairness, huh.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: And surmounting the rulesetters within their own rules? Lunatic ravings.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Ugh...!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Careful.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Oof... I—I'm fine, now let go...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I'm sorry, it's been a while since I used a weapon with a handle this long. I'm still not quite perfect at exercising it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —Ma-ri-a? What are you laughing at?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Eh? Ah, I'm sorry, sorry.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Margaret.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You really have changed.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hm? Have I?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I don't mean your appearance. Your hair's all messy now. Come here, I'll comb it straight for you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria, bring the comb over. It's behind your worktable.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ah, okay.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Let's sit and take a moment to breathe.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Alright. Thank you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Honestly... it feels like it's only been the blink of an eye since you left.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: (The blink of an eye... and you'll be even farther away from us.)
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —According to reports, the deceased Infected appeared to be implicated in the illegal Infected incident. The relevant circumstances are still under investigation.
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: The Knights Association promises that an incident this minor absolutely will not affect the course of the Major's schedule—
attributes.name: A Voice on the PA

attributes.content: Zofia... that's...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ingra again, is it? For him to be killing on the field, though...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —Currently, visitors to events involving Infected knights are asking for the Knights Association to resolve the situation.
attributes.name: A Voice on the Display

attributes.content: At the same time, 'Brassrust' Olmer Ingra and several other knights who were directly involved in this event have taken interviews—
attributes.name: A Voice on the Display

attributes.content: Are you listening? Mr. Malkiewicz?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, Jewell. Carry on.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes, sir. Actually, they're forms from the Knights Association, with the personal details and noteworthy points for all Grand Knights taking part this time.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: The General Chamber would rather not ruin relations with these stars, so they're hoping we can be more attentive...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Let me see...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: (They're all established athletes... oh, the Radiant Knight really is in here, too.)
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Does this 'Nightmare Knight' not have a Knightclub affiliation? I thought the Radiant Knight was the only case of an independent qualifying for the Major?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: And besides, 'Nightmare Knight'... Aren't the Grand Knights' titles usually less of a mouthful? And he doesn't have a 'The' either?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: He's not one of the Grand Knights, then? So what's so special about him?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Ah, this one... haha. He's been a great pain for the Knights Association to handle. I don't entirely know what's up, but...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: He doesn't care a single bit about knight titles or any such thing, and brushes off all arrangements the General Chamber makes, but he isn't deliberately disobedient either.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: He's a weird one.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: A weird one, huh?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes, sir, but there's no doubt about his strength. And besides, I don't know why, but it seems some knight families are extremely curious about his identity. They've tried asking the Association countless times already.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: But we're not too clear on what's going on with him either. Things suggest he came from some rural area near Sargon?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Mr. Malkiewicz?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...I understand. You're free to go.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Oh, one thing, Jewell.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Hm? What is it?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: I'm still the same Malkiewicz you know... so no need to be so reserved with me. I'm not used to it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Ah... as you wish, I mean, understood, Mal—Mr... Malkiewicz.
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.text: How should the National Council rule? With a severe incident on the inaugural day of the Major, what can the Knights Association do to respond?
Blue Ear Wine Cellar—The traditional choice for three centuries, the taste of chivalry—
